ARABIC: بَلْ نَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلْبَٰطِلِ فَيَدْمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٌ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْوَيْلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Rather We hurl the truth against falsehood and it cuts right through it and it vanishes clean away! Woe without end for you for what you portray!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In fact We strike the truth against the false, which shatters it, and it disappears. Woe to you for what you attribute (to Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay, We hurl the Truth at falsehood so that the Truth crushes falsehood, and lo! it vanishes. Woe to you for what you utter!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We bring forward the Truth to crush and destroy falsehood; it is doomed to be banished. Woe to you for your way of thinking about God!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: But in fact We hurl the truth upon falsehood, so it scatters its brains – thereupon it vanishes; and for you is the ruin due to the matters you fabricate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, We fling the truth against the falsehood, so it destroys it, and behold, it disappears. And woe to you for that which you ascribe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! We cast the truth against the falsehood, so that it breaks its head, and lo! it vanishes; and woe to you for what you describe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but We hurl the truth against falsehood and it prevails over it, and behold, falsehood vanishes away. Then woe to you for that you describe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but We hurl the true against the false, and it doth break its head and lo! it vanisheth. And yours will be woe for that which ye ascribe (unto Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We will hurl the truth at falsehood, the falsehood shall be crushed and will disappear. Woe to you for what you utter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Aye! We hurl truth against false hood, so that it braineth it, and lo! it vanisheth; and to you be the woe for that which ye utter!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, We hurl the truth against falsehood, and it crushes its head, and behold, falsehood vanishes! And woe to you for what you allege [about Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, We hurl the Truth against falsehood, and it knocks out its brain, and behold, falsehood doth perish! Ah! woe be to you for the (false) things ye ascribe (to Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, We fling (send down) the truth (this Quran) against the falsehood (disbelief), so it destroys it, and behold, it (falsehood) is vanished. And woe to you for that (lie) which you ascribe (to Us) (against Allah by uttering that Allah has a wife and a son).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, We hurl truth at falsehood, and it shall conquer it, and see, falsehood vanishes. Woe to you for all you have described.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, We hurl the truth against falsehood, and it crushes it, so it vanishes. Woe unto you, for what you describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:18] Nay, but We hurl, We cast, the truth, faith, against falsehood, disbelief, and it obliterates it, and behold, it vanishes, disappears (damaghahu, ‘it obliterates it’, actually means ‘it struck the brain with a blow’, [a blow] which is fatal). And for you, O disbelievers of Mecca, there shall be woe, severe chastisement, for what you ascribe, to God, of mate or child.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but We hurl the true) We cast the Truth (against the false) upon falsehood; it is also said: We exposit the Truth and falsehood, (and it doth break its head) and it makes it perish (and lo! it vanisheth) i.e. falsehood. (And yours) group of disbelievers (will be woe) severe punishment (for that which ye ascribe (unto Him)) for your claim that the angels are Allah's daughters.
